title: Top down swipe is possible even when the phone is locked.
content:
When my Pixel 3A XL is locked, I can turn the screen on by pressing power button and swipe down from top to access and change the quick settings. This is not really secure, correct?
Anyone can take an unattended phone and switch off or on the wifi, hotspot, etc., when it should not be done.
Hopefully this is fixed. Any settings change should be possible after unlocking the device by the device owner.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3a XL
